articles.description: England comprehensively thrash beat New Zealand by seven wickets with a professional performance in the first T20 at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: England comprehensively crush NZ in first T20

articles.description: Rangers' dreams of an immediate return to the Champions League group stage are extinguished in excruciating fashion by a ruthless PSV in Eindhoven.
articles.title: Ruthless PSV dump Rangers out of Champions League

articles.description: League One side Lincoln City knock Sheffield United out of the EFL Cup by winning 3-2 on penalties in the second round at Bramall Lane.
articles.title: Sheffield United knocked out of EFL Cup by Lincoln

articles.description: Treble winners Manchester City will travel to Newcastle United in the third round of the Carabao Cup.
articles.title: Newcastle to host Man City in EFL Cup

articles.description: Andy Murray believes he is playing his best tennis since hip surgery as he prepares to face old rival Grigor Dimitrov in the US Open second round.
articles.title: Murray ‘playing best' since hip operation

articles.description: England captain Jos Buttler makes "one of the all-time terrible reviews" after appealing for an lbw decison against New Zealand in the first T20 at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: 'One of the all-time terrible reviews' Buttler wastes England review

articles.description: England thrash New Zealand by seven wickets with a professional performance in the first T20 of their four-match series at Chester-le-Street.
articles.title: England thrash New Zealand in first T20

articles.description: Chelsea come from behind to beat AFC Wimbledon in the second round of the Carabao Cup.
articles.title: Chelsea survive scare to beat AFC Wimbledon

articles.description: Arnaut Danjuma scores an 88th-minute winner as Premier League Everton came from behind to beat League Two Doncaster Rovers and reach the third round of the Carabao Cup.
articles.title: Danjuma hits late Everton winner at Doncaster

articles.description: Seventh seed Stefanos Tsitsipas suffers a shock defeat by Dominic Stricker in the second round of the US Open.
articles.title: Tsitsipas stunned by world number 128 Stricker
